entry.title: Louis_Armstrong - My Sweet Hunk O` Trash (Feat. Sy Oliver & His Orchestra) - 가사

link.title: Louis_Armstrong - My Sweet Hunk O` Trash (Feat. Sy Oliver & His Orchestra) - 가사

entry.content:
You don't add up to much
Ain't got that glamour touch
You're trifling, lazy, ain't worth a cigarette ash
Look out there, mama, look out there
You can't be too fast, watch it baby
You're just my good for nothin'
My sweet hunk o' trash
My my, how you sound

You're very short on looks, Hear hear hear
Dumb when it comes to books
Look out baby, watch it honey
And you stay full of corn just like succotash
What you want me to do in my idle moments
You're just a good for nothin'
But my sweet hunk o' trash
Let me get a word in there honey
You runnin' your mouth

You said I've worried you for years
I'm just a barfly moochin' beers
While you sweat over a hot stove, slingin' hash
Worked my fingers right down to the elbows
Yes, I may be good for nothin'
But I'm still your sweet hunk o' trash
Forced to admit it, baby, forced to admit it

You said I spread my love all around
And with the chicks all over town
But how can I when you keep me broke
So I can't spend no cash
Yes, I may be good for nothin'
But I'm still your sweet hunk o' trash

Listen here pops
You know you lie about your youth
I don't lie, baby
I'm just careless with the truth, that's all
How careless can you be
I don't know
With all young chicks you try to make a flash
Now baby, it ain't like that, no
But you're still my good for nothin'
My sweet hunk o' trash

Now when you stay out very late
It sure makes me mad to wait
How come baby
Cause you come home too tired to raise just one eyelash
Watch it baby, watch it
You're just good for nothin'
But you're my sweet hunk o' trash
Yes indeed

entry.title: Louis_Armstrong - You Can`t Lose A Broken Heart (Feat. Sy Oliver & His Orchestra) - 가사

link.title: Louis_Armstrong - You Can`t Lose A Broken Heart (Feat. Sy Oliver & His Orchestra) - 가사

entry.content:
Don't lose your head
Then lose your guy
You can't lose a broken heart

If you ever break up
Then try to make up
It's tough to make a brand new start

Take a walk
Think it over
While strolling neath the moon
Don't say things in December
You'll regret in June

Ware your remark
Before you speak
Or you may be sorry soon
Don't be erratic
Be diplomatic
To keep your heart's in tune

Cruel harsh words
Often spoken
Will upset your applecart
So don't lose your head
Then lose your guy
Cause, you can't lose a broken heart
No, you can't lose a broken heart

entry.title: Louis_Armstrong - Blueberry Hill - 가사
entry.content:
I found my thrill on Blueberry Hill
On Blueberry Hill when I found you
The moon stood still on Blueberry Hill
And lingered until my dreams came true

The wind in the willow played love's sweet melody
But all of those vows we made were never to be
Though we're apart you're part of me still
For you were my thrill on Blueberry Hill

I found my thrill
Come climb the hill with me, baby
On Blueberry Hill
We'll see what we shall see

On Blueberry Hill
I'll bring my horn with me
When I found you
I'll be with you where berries are blue

The moon stood still
Each afternoon we'll go
On Blueberry Hill
Higher than the moon we'll go
And lingered until
Then, to a weddin' in June we'll go
My dreams came true

The wind in the willow played
Do you really love me
Love's sweet melody
As I love you

But all of those vows we made
Will you still remember
Were never to be
When the night is through

Though we're apart you're part of me still
For you were my thrill on Blueberry Hill

entry.title: Louis_Armstrong - That Lucky Old Sun (Just Rolls Around Heaven All Day) - 가사

link.title: Louis_Armstrong - That Lucky Old Sun (Just Rolls Around Heaven All Day) - 가사

entry.content:
Up in the mornin', out on the job
Work like the devil for my pay
But that lucky old sun has nothin' to do
But roll around Heaven all day

Fuss with my woman, toil for my kids
Sweat till I'm wrinkled and gray
While that lucky old sun has nothin' to do
But roll around Heaven all day

Good Lord, up above, can't you know I'm pinin'
Tears all in my eyes
Send down that cloud with a silver linin'
Lift me to Paradise

Show me that river, take me across
And wash all my troubles away
Like that lucky old sun, give me nothin' to do
But roll around Heaven all day

Good Lord above, can't you know I'm pinin'
Tears all in my eyes
Send down that cloud with a silver linin'
Lift me to Paradise

Show me that river, take me across
And wash all my troubles away
Like that lucky old sun, give me nothin' to do
But roll around Heaven, Heaven, Heaven
Oh, roll around Heaven, Heaven, Heaven all day
Let me roll around in Heaven all day

entry.title: Louis_Armstrong - Maybe It`s Because - 가사
entry.content:
Maybe it's because the kiss you gave me
Touched my heart and went right through
Now I can't tell you why I only know that I
Fell helplessly in love with you

Oh, maybe it's because the song we danced to
Told a story old and new
I can't figure out just why it came about
Or how I fell in love with you

I could say you're grand and therefore
I care for you so
But there is a why and wherefore
And I'd like to know

Now maybe it's because the star I wished on
Made a certain wish come true
Or it just could be that you were meant for me
And maybe I was meant, oh baby, meant for you

Oh, baby, or it just could be that you were meant for me
And, baby, I was meant for you

entry.title: 이진협_트리오 - My Cozy Little Room (Feat. Forest Muther) - 가사

link.title: 이진협_트리오 - My Cozy Little Room (Feat. Forest Muther) - 가사

entry.content:
Music is made through
someone's environment
and experience
And we call those
who express them musician
But many musicians
can't be bothered this
they think nothing
but cool rhymes
cool melodies
but they can't give vent
to musician's feeling
whatever they play some notes
There must be a reason
to play those notes
When I was a child
I lived in a small room
with the piano
In that room
I listened to many kinds
of music that give me
an inspiration
Pop jazz many kind of music
give me inspiration
At first
I just tried to copy
my favorite musician
and I practiced like them
Of course
playing like them
is great strategy
But you should find
your own color
One day someone told me
you’re playing is
like Robert Glasper
and your solo is
like Cory Henry
I’m appreciated
but just being no more
than second Cory henry
and second Robert Glasper
Doesn’t do it for me
You must have your own color
What is this
the most important thing
to compose the music
Chords Rhythm Melody
Most important thing is time
keeping
Precise time keep makes groove
We’re sometimes missing
this important thing
that we should know
Many music teachers
don’t think of
how important this is
Space in music can
emphasize the next note
and it gives a break
while playing
Space is important to playing
and soloing
for example
I can’t have a conversation
with constantly talking
if you want to talk
to another
you should say concisely
and strongly
what you want to say
I want to say about soloing
it should be most direct way
to express my feeling
Well you must follow
the chord tone
and scale but apart
from these things
anyone can’t interfere
with your soloing
Just play what you want
We compete
Young musicians in Korea
can’t live without competing
with each other
and I’m also competing
with all young
and talented musicians
But I think nothing
but competing can’t
improve your skills
Must try and endure
yourself to be improved
I hope these things
that I’ve been thinking
will influence to my music
